name: Escape from Lavender Mirror Corporate Island Mall
name_original: Escape from Lavender Mirror Corporate Island Mall
description:
Escape from Lavender Mirror Corporate Island Mall is an endless, hypnagogic screensaver dreamscape and hard ambient mix all in one piece of software. The viewer is led through a frenetic, multi story environment built with a collection of assets from Jira Duguid’s and Jeremy Couillard’s video game works in progress along with music by PBL.FYI and Lloydfears. An early version of the software was used at a performance by the artists as part of the Fantasia Malware Presents series in August 2022 in Berlin.

🎵🎵🎵 Listen to the mix...
